name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a love for all things vintage. With its retro console box, classic arms and legs, and a laser screen, RetroCat brings a nostalgic charm to the world of robots. As a member of the WebtrES club, RetroCat combines its passion for technology with a strong sense of community. Whether it's analyzing waveforms or engaging in social interactions, RetroCat is always ready to share its knowledge and skills with others.
